TopicTitle: why I am not able to see my post.

Articles.Content:
I recently posted some answers on threads and in my profile, it's showing two posts. However, in my activities section, there is nothing, and I am not able to see comments posted by me. I don't know what the problem is.

Kindly have a look at it and fix the issue.

15 minutes ago, averyyoung said:

I recently posted some answers on threads and in my profile, it's showing two posts. However, in my activities section, there is nothing, and I am not able to see comments posted by me. I don't know what the problem is.

Hi @averyyoung, your thread moved from KSP 1 discussion to Kerbal Network for better visibility and we are looking into the issue.

@averyyoung, I must extend you an apology. This was my mistake. I removed your posts under the mistaken impression that they were submitted by a spambot. They have been restored. I'm embarrassed and very sorry.
